member.name: UI_ANIMATION_REPEAT_MODE
member.summary: Defines the pattern for a loop iteration.

member.name: UI_ANIMATION_REPEAT_MODE.UI_ANIMATION_REPEAT_MODE_NORMAL
member.summary: The start of a loop begins with the first value (v1->v2, v1->v2, v1->v2, and so on).

member.name: UI_ANIMATION_REPEAT_MODE.UI_ANIMATION_REPEAT_MODE_ALTERNATE
member.summary: The start of a loop alternates between values (v1->v2, v2->v1, v1->v2, and so on).
